meanings.definition: The quality of being easy to see or understand.
meanings.sent1: The clearness of the instructions made it simple to follow.
meanings.sent2: The clearness of the map helped us find our way easily.
meanings.sent3: The clearness of the recipe made it seem like a piece of cake to bake.
meanings.sent4: The clearness of her explanation was like a beam of light in the darkness of confusion.
meanings.sent5: The clearness of the concept shone brightly in my mind.

meanings.definition: The state of being free from clouds, mist, or haze.
meanings.sent1: The clearness of the sky allowed the sun to shine through.
meanings.sent2: The clearness of the air after the storm was refreshing.
meanings.sent3: The clearness of the window made the view crystal clear.
meanings.sent4: The clearness of the lake reflected the blue sky like a mirror.
meanings.sent5: The clearness of the morning brought a sense of peace.

meanings.definition: The quality of being transparent or easily perceived.
meanings.sent1: The clearness of the glass made it almost invisible.
meanings.sent2: The clearness of her intentions was evident in her actions.
meanings.sent3: The clearness of the water made it look like liquid crystal.
meanings.sent4: The clearness of his voice cut through the noise like a sharp knife.
meanings.sent5: The clearness of the message left no room for doubt.
